original_title: Opposition MPs in committee appointed to look into SL’s bankruptcy to resign?
original_body_lines: Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa urged all Opposition MPs in the Select Committee appointed to look into how Sri Lanka went into bankruptcy, to resign from the committee and said the Opposition will have its own probe into the matter.

"The Select Committee appointed by Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena is of no use as it is chaired by the General Secretary of the party which took the country to bankruptcy. Therefore, I urge all Opposition members of the committee to resign from it. Let us have our own probe with regard to the matter," Mr. Premadasa told a meeting of Opposition parties. (Yohan Perera)
